column4: Add title to app; new module ViewMarkup; add rendering of bold and italic

Work on rendering lists; respond to Rob's comments
change type of viewValue and viewText

Add function isConsistent and new rule
Add tests for parser configuration builds and validity
Make it possible to change configs at runtime in app
Update NOTES; refactor; Configuration.markup; truly minimal config
